Best Air Fryers 2026

Air fryers should deliver crisp results quickly without taking over your counter. We prioritize even cooking, easy cleanup, and value at common price points.

FAQ

What size air fryer is best for a small kitchen?

A 4-6 quart model balances capacity with counter space and works for most small households.

Are air fryers cheaper to run than ovens?

Yes, they typically use less energy because they heat quickly and cook in smaller chambers.
